attributes.action: Ban Vedanta Resources in London Stock Exchange
attributes.additional_details:
Please order an investigation from UK, and instruct London Stock Exchange to delist Vedanta Resources.

More details:
https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/history-sterlite-thoothukudi-story-betrayal-crony-regulators-78481

attributes.background:
12 people have been killed by Shoot at Sight order issued by Tamilnadu Police against the innocent people protested against the unethical operations of Vedanta Resources, an UK based company.

Please launch an independent investigation and ban Sterlite Copper from London Stock Exchange.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Listing companies on the London Stock Exchange is the responsibility of the London Stock Exchange Group, which is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You could start a new petition about something the UK Parliament and Government are responsible for.
